LayoutCatalog.Name: 1. Bootstrap 5 design
LayoutCatalog.Description: A clean, modern responsive layout built with Bootstrap 5. Includes extensive template pages for common website needs including home, about, contact, blog, portfolio, and testimonials.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 3. California Design System
LayoutCatalog.Description: The Design System makes it easy for state digital teams to build accessible, consistent, and performant services and products to meet Californiansâ€™ needs.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 4. Tailwind CSS design
LayoutCatalog.Description: A utility-first approach using Tailwind CSS. Production-ready starter template with minimal setup and customizable configuration. Includes home, about, and contact pages.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 5. Basic starter design
LayoutCatalog.Description: A minimal, framework-agnostic starter template perfect for learning the build process or as a blank canvas for custom designs. Simple home page with basic structure.
